items.content_html: react-hive is a lightweight and powerful state management library for React, offering a centralized store, efficient selectors, async actions, and middleware support for building scalable applications.
items.title: DaimDN/react-hive: react-hive is a lightweight and powerful state management library for React, offering a centralized store, efficient selectors, async actions, and middleware support for building scalable applications.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: qodalis-solutions/angular-web-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. items.content_html: fetchQuery is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that simplifies making HTTP requests with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations. Inspired by the popular axios library, fetchQuery provides an easy-to-use API for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests. https://www.npmjs.com/package/fetchquery
items.title: DaimDN/fetchquery: fetchQuery is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that simplifies making HTTP requests with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations. Inspired by the popular axios library, fetchQuery provides an easy-to-use API for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests. https://www.npmjs.com/package/fetchquery

items.content_html: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.
items.title: creasydude/crcrypt: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.
